---
title: "Empirical Likelihood Ratio Test"
author: "Ho-Ryun Chung"
description: ""
date: "2025-04-03"
categories: []
---
The empirical likelihood ratio test (ELT) leverages on the power of the likelihood ratio test without relying on a (parametric) statistical model. In this way the ELT liberates statistical hypothesis testing from statistical model misspecification that calls into question the validity of statistical inferences.
